trans-unit.source: Comma-separated list of fields for generating the page title. First field with data is used.
Add name of website to page title (from site-configurationn, needs pageTitleSeparator set)
If set the defined fields in pageTitleFields are combined in the order of their appearence instead of being used as fallbacks-chain (needs pageTitleSeparator set).
Comma-separated list of fields for generating the page title. First field with data is used.
Add name of website to page title (from site-configurationn, needs pageTitleSeparatorNews set)
If set the defined fields in pageTitleFieldsNews are combined in the order of their appearence instead of being used as fallbacks-chain (needs pageTitleSeparatorNews set).
When set, typical unicode characters allowing for easy identification of AI-content are removed or replaced.
Comma-separated list of typical unicode characters that are used for easy identification of AI-content and are to be removed.
Comma-separated list of typical unicode characters that are used for easy identification of AI-content and are to be replaced by a whitespace.
